18th century, North America. Amidst the chaos and violence  of  the
French and Indian War, Shay Patrick Cormac, a fearless young member
of the Brotherhood of Assassins, undergoes  a  dark  transformation
that will forever shape the future of the American  colonies. After
a dangerous mission gone tragically wrong, Shay turns his  back  on
the Assassins who, in response, attempt to end his life

Features:
- Use the deadly rifle Shaya for melee and ranged. Divert or destroy your opponent by using your arsenal of weapons available, including various specific bullets, shells and grenades.
- Get rid of the Assassins persecution because of your unique and updated eagle vision. Use this skill to monitor the surroundings and calculate the assassins lurking in the shadows, on the roof or in the crowd.
- New Tactics: protect from attacks assassins who will try to board your ship and destroy your crew. Bounce as quickly as possible to avoid large losses in your team.
- New weapons: use burning oil, which leaves trail of fire and burn enemy ships and gun tow - rapid-fire guns, effective for firing boarding teams.
- The North Atlantic world is full of opportunities: wade through the ice cover, explore the snowy countryside and looking hiding places where you can hide during sea battles.
- North Atlantic Ocean. You will meet on your way a giant iceberg and feel on their skin all the power of the cold north winds.
- River valleys. A large variety of nature requires the presence of the North American river navigation skills, as well as overland travel.
- New York. One of the most famous cities in the world, completely recreated by the descriptions of the XVIII century.
